html:
11.16.17  10:26 pm   hmm, what does this ask button do? 

     it allows me to read your question

11.16.17  10:24 pm   I was making a video and halfway through editing I stopped because I convinced myself that I hated the video which looking back, I think that was a great video.  what do you think about my video?

     i haven't seen it

11.16.17  10:10 pm   do you start with lyrics or music?

     no

11.16.17  10:06 pm   sometimes i sleep with my foot hanging off the side of the bed, then i remember there's some evil monster under my bed so i put it back on the bed. why do i do this?

     i think you already explained

11.16.17  10:02 pm   what's the funniest way you've been injured?

     walked into a clear wall

11.16.17  9:59 pm   if your life was a movie, what songs would be on the soundtrack?

     i would make the soundtrack

11.16.17  9:31 pm   Are you secretly George washington

     are you sure a public page is the right place to post secrets

11.16.17  9:19 pm   What is the average lifespan of a unicorn?

     forever

11.16.17  9:17 pm   Hey bill In your snail time video I feel like I've heard the background music in another one of your videos as well but I don't know which one. Anyways if it waswhich video was it used in again?

     i never re-use music. that music was composed for snail time and used only for snail time. there were however 2 slightly different versions of snail time, depending on which platform it was shown on, but in both cases the video had a lot of snails and was called snail time

11.16.17  8:50 pm   got any advice on procrastination? 

     just keep saying the word procrastination. it is a long, wasteful word. it will help you waste time

11.16.17  8:49 pm   If you could reincarnate in an animal of your choosing, what would it be? Human doesn't count.

     yes it does

11.16.17  8:46 pm   Do you think cats should rule the world?

     ah, but can they

11.16.17  8:46 pm   Thoughts on meds with digital tracking in them?

     seems legit

11.16.17  8:38 pm   what's your favorite kind of person?

     deluxe

11.16.17  8:21 pm   why can't I hold onto friends

     because there is too much turbulence in the atmosphere

11.16.17  8:12 pm   Can I be your lawyer for your next case?

     you can be the judge

11.16.17  7:39 pm   Do you ever want to ask yourself a question?

     i've been doing it all my life

11.16.17  6:49 pm   bill what do i do to maintain a long distance relationship?

     love the person, and also visit them sometimes

11.16.17  6:47 pm   Various phrasing in Google is failing me. How do you, personally, define "writing tare"? I'd like to understand your context.

     i named it spontaneously, and spelled it differently on purpose. it is actually 'writing tear', like when you go on a tear. like let me just tear through chapter 9 of this book. or let me just go on a cooking tear, or whatever. but the word tear looks ambiguous in terms of pronunciation so i switched the spelling to keep it interesting

11.16.17  6:25 pm   Do you think there are some things humans will just never figure out/understand

     no

      even if we continue on this fast track of crazy progress and advancements in science and math and technology and stuff? Part of me feels like there may be some things that will always be beyond our comprehension, but at the same time if you look at all the wild advancements made in just the past 100 years, things can start getting pretty serious real soon.

11.16.17  6:11 pm   are there any good people left?

     yes, there's actually more

11.16.17  6:10 pm   Have you ever said "cat wash" in one of your videos?

     i'm not sure, but i know i have said it in tweets

11.16.17  5:46 pm   Hi Bill! I'm curious if you do put together a band for a tour, what songs (out of the ones you've already put out) do you think would be strong choices for a setlist?

     which ever ones people are not expecting

     Also, do you think you'd want to work shorter songs in there too (like your <2min songs like school, feel okay, i like, jodie foster, etc)

     absolutely

     ..And one more question (sorry for ramblin').. do you think doing the narrative/score type stuff live would be possible?

     i'm not interested in doing that stuff on a live show. just songs. not videos

     Like narrating the steve video or something while the band plays the score behind you live? That would be really unique. I think you're in such an interesting position because a lot of your music isn't necessarily in the form of 'songs'.

     the live show will be songs only. and maybe some additional pranks

11.16.17  5:43 pm   Why is an alarm clock going "off" when it actually turns on?

     ah, that's because of the mandela effect

11.16.17  5:28 pm   if you write a book about failure, and it doesn't sell, is it called success?

     no

11.16.17  5:14 pm   Do a make-up tutorial 

     i will do it when i get a chance

11.16.17  5:14 pm   if you could, would you?

     i can and do already

11.16.17  5:08 pm   Did humans invent beauty?

     everyone invents beauty

11.16.17  2:54 pm   what is cringe

     it's when you think you really hate something, but actually you really like it

11.16.17  2:45 pm   Did you change the background of the questions page to a lighter grey or is it just my imagination?

     i did not change it, but you might be on a different screen, or perhaps looking at your screen from a slightly different angle

11.16.17  1:49 pm   would you move to mars if you could?

     not until it's as least as cool as earth

11.16.17  1:32 pm   I'm so excited to see the video but probably not as excited as you are to have it done and never have to see it again

     oh true

11.16.17  1:29 pm   are you a dedicated member of the illuminati

     i'm not a member but i work in their kitchen

11.16.17  12:14 pm   if our brains get too smart they'll become self aware and take over our bodies

     i think that already happened a long time ago

11.16.17  11:59 am   what are dreams made of

     realities

11.16.17  10:44 am   What's your guilty pleasure?

     existing

11.16.17  9:27 am   Am I me?

     i will check

11.16.17  7:18 am   Can do my advanced calculus homework?

     i will do it when i get a chance

11.16.17  6:40 am   Is it possible to fall in love thru the internet?

     i think so

11.16.17  3:53 am   Why won't you go back to doing those short little videos?

     because i have done way too many, compared to the amount of medium/longer videos i've done

      They are fun, binge-able and relatively easy to make, compared to your newer stuff. I'm not saying you should stop doing the longer videos,

     making short videos at the same time would only delay the other videos more

      just that the short videos are too good to be thrown away. 

     i didn't throw them away, they are all still available on this website, and most people have not seen them all

11.16.17  2:10 am   how do I know if I'm getting close to a point where I might "burn-out" by trying to do too much in a short amount of time without breaks?

     you won't know. you won't even know when you get there, you will try to deny it for a while

11.16.17  12:50 am   why do companies only have vice presidents

     they have regular presidents too

11.16.17  12:04 am   bill in what ways are your artistic endeavors influenced by a clockwork orange?

     none. i've never seen it and i don't know what it's about. someone told me that if i watch it i might have a really bad time

11.15.17  11:58 pm   how do i keep my net neutral

     the only way to do that for sure is to make your own

11.15.17  11:42 pm   what's the first step to make music?

     find an instrument, i suppose

11.15.17  11:33 pm   do u ever wish u could commit sudoku

     no

11.15.17  11:09 pm   where did you learn music theory?

     which one

11.15.17  11:04 pm   what made you want to do longer videos after the short jingles era?

     to have room for more things to happen in the video

11.15.17  11:01 pm   what's the closest thing to magic in the real world?

     life

11.15.17  10:52 pm   your thoughts on the concept of love?

     seems legit
